Uses of Class
galoot.types.BlockFragment

Packages that use BlockFragment
galoot.types   
 

Uses of BlockFragment in galoot.types
 

Methods in galoot.types that return BlockFragment
 BlockFragment Document.getBlock(java.lang.String name)
           
 BlockFragment BlockFragment.getBlock(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the block with the given name, or null if it doesn't exist
 BlockFragment Document.getDocumentBlock()
          Returns the top-level "block", which is a BlockFragment.
 

Methods in galoot.types with parameters of type BlockFragment
 boolean Document.replaceBlock(BlockFragment newBlock)
           
 boolean BlockFragment.replaceBlock(BlockFragment newBlock)
          Replace the block with the same name as the newBlock with the contents of the newBlock, and return the BlockFragments that will now not be available.
